name: while(true) (TomekS)
description:
You are a controller of an exploration robot stranded in far away planet, sadly its code corrupted and it will break once it runs out of commands, so your task is to type navigation orders into console as fast as you can. 

HOW TO PLAY:
- TYPE in COMMANDS to operate the robot and submit with ENTER
- Each grid cell executes 1 command.
- Navigate the robot to the GREEN point to complete the level.
- If the robot RUNS out of commands the game is over.
- You can START typing during the countdown, so plan ahead.
- Don't drive to rocks, out of the path or out of the map. 
- The command line is always focused, you don't need to click it to type.
- The turn command execute in spot. 

THE GAME HAS TWO DIFFICULTY LEVELS:
NORMAL: You just type first letter of a command "l" for turning left, "r" for turning right and "m" for moving forward one tile. 
HARD: you need to type full commands "left", "right" or "move". It's similar to a typing test :D

THE GAME HAS 101 PROCEDURALLY GENERATED LEVELS, with progressive size. The progress is saved, so when you reopen it will start from previously played level. 

TOOLS USED:
- Unitu 2019.4
- VSCode
- Blender
- Photoshop
- Bosca Ceoil 
- Bfxr
